description: Bhuvneshwar Kumar is a right arm medium-fast bowler also known as the first Indian bowler to take a five-wicket haul in all formats of the game. His specialty is creating a late swing. He is also a low order right-handed batsmen.
name: Bhuvneshwar Kumar | Indian National Cricket Player
